text: Kristin Lisa Herrera (born 21 February 1989) is an American actress. She performs mostly on television. She played Lourdes Del Torro in General Hospital. She played Dana Cruz in Zoey 101. Herrera took a break from acting starting in 2008. Herrera was born in Los Angeles. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1989 births Category:Living people
title: Kristin Herrera
